pages.text: Too scary -or- bug-lover's paradise?$(p)Craft an Offering Altar, give it an emerald, a piece of obsidian, and a diamond, and you'll receive a Gaean Gem. This is used to make the Staff of Gaea (you'll want to make 2 of these, I promise)

Build a portal that is 2x3 on the inside and fill it with leaves. The frame can be anything you want. The leaves can be any kind you want.$(p)Set a Gaean Keystone near the portal and insert the staff.$(p)$(l)Do NOT forget your other staff!$()
